author: chris-dollin

sub-directory, testing/modelspecs, for holding test files that need to
be files, with one empty ruleset in it. Plus added JMS.ruleSetURL and

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added tests for extracting the reasoner from a specification, resulting
in the creation of getReasonerFactory, which then migrated to
ModelSpecImpl (perhaps a better home will be found for it later).
Modified OntModelSpec to use it. The two new exceptions may be
thrown by getReasonerFactory if the reasoner specification is missing
